title: Ground News - Concierge Med Spas: A Haven of Tranquility and Privacy - The Daily Iowan
text: The wellness industry has witnessed a transformative trend: the emergence of concierge med spas. This novel concept marries the opulence of traditional spa treatments with the personalized care and convenience of concierge services, offering a bespoke wellness journey unlike any other.
